creator: prasad.subramanian@sun.com
text:
If a <jsp:params> element is made a child of the <jsp:include> element then a
translation time error should occur. It does not happen.

creator: justyna.horwat@sun.com
text:
Made sure reader does not match simply to the "jsp:param" string. "jsp:params"
was considered a successful match previously. Added a more clear error report
for a non-matching case. Fixed in Tomcat 4.0.
